title: Meme-Integrated Learning Program for Understanding Pharmacology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of drug mechanisms
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens who prefer visual learning using memes to acquire advanced pharmacology knowledge, accessing an LMS platform via personal devices with weekly video lectures and quiz-based formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain major drug classifications and mechanisms of action with over 90% accuracy
Learners can creatively reproduce three or more drug interaction scenarios using memes
Learners can achieve over 80 points in applying pharmacological concepts through weekly formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
